data.title: OutOfMemoryException in AudReader.LoadSound
data.body:
Not sure that it's normal behaviour for a 2d game on laptop with 8GB ram about 4 Gb free. 
full log:
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20160508
on map 0fc99b4c2f05c5cc139c80108bdd253715a71d61 (Vegetation by hamb/Chris Forbes).
Operating System: OSX (Unix 14.5.0.0)
Runtime Version: Mono 3.12.1 ((detached/b7764aa) CLR 4.0.30319.17020

data.title: Introduce trait granting upgrades at specified DamageStates
data.body:
Used to implement slowdown for damaged vehicles, but I'm sure there are many more possibilities (disabling certain weapons at critical damage etc.).

Closes #6272.

data.title: Shift+hotkey queues 5 units for production. Fixes #5544
Added WithResourceSeedingAnimation and WithResourceSeedingOverlay
data.body: A more true to the original approach. From the discussion started at https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/9205#issuecomment-136151851.

data.title: Removed dead AI code
data.body: Edit: Changed PR to remove unused code instead.

data.title: Added the sniper back into multiplayer for France
data.body: Fits to the deception theme. Achieved broad consensus in the balancing discussion [forums](http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&p=292926#292926).

data.title: Renamed C4Demolition to Demolition
data.body: A rather boring tidy-up refactoring submission.

data.title: Some D2k polishing
data.body:
Fixed d2k grenadier stand sequence facings (other sequences are not affected), gave larger missiles a ballistic flight curve and changed `yes` to `true` on all boolean properties for consistency.

Fixes #9516.
Closes #10137.

data.title: Fix exploding V2RL sound
data.body:
You could here the 'Report' of the V2 weapon when the launcher exploded. Added V2-exclusive explosion weapon to fix that.

Closes #8367.

data.title: Some WithParachute fixes
data.body:
- shadow animation now ticks in `Tick` rather than `Render`
- removed redundant `ITraitInfo` implementation
- made shadow `DistanceAboveTerrain`-aware

data.title: Fixed a crash when loading the Dune 2000 shellmap in the map editor
data.body: It will crash with `Bounds of actor concreteb Actor26 are empty.` now after I added some more useful information to the stacktraces. It happens, because concrete has `RenderSprites`, but only uses it to draw the icon. The concrete itself is a terrain modification using the `LaysTerrain` trait. So without anything that calculates the bounds of this invisible actor the editor crashes. Will probably happen with any Dune 2000 map that contains pre-placed buildings.

data.title: Dedicated server logfile command
data.body: A switch for defining logfile location and filename would be good to add so dedicated server log files can be defined per instance.

data.title: Play reload sounds only to owner
data.body: Fixes #11236.

data.title: No Credits given on nod08a - "Battle for Zaire (a)"
data.body:
Doesn't give Credits to player upon recovering nod base.

https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/11280

data.title: Dump Mono.NAT in favor of Open.Nat 2.0.16
data.body:
Closes #7140.
Fixes #8794.

Depends on #11284. I can try the .NET 3.5 variant, but I don't want to as we will then need to ship our own version of `System.Threading` DLLs, which will cause a lot of unnecessary bloat.

data.title: Updated to Maxmind GeoIP 2.6.0 and Database reader 2.0.0
data.body:
Depends on https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/11284.

Benefits for us are:
- The database parser is significantly faster.
- Unused RestSharp dependency can be dropped now.

data.title: Updated to .NET version 4.5
data.body: Closes https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/10661.

data.title: Add nod08b
data.body:
Add nod08b - "Battle for Zaire (b)"
http://cnc.wikia.com/wiki/Battle_for_Zaire

**Known issue:**
Boats turn into idle actors and stop their patrol, each time they attack an unit.
Is there a way to avoid turning them into idle actors?

data.title: Getting constant exception, file not named
data.body:
I started encountering an exception (bad indent). Through some trial and error (making a dummy mod and adding back each yaml file until I encountered the exception again), I think it might be in my structures yaml. (It didn't specify which, see exceptions log below).

However, I tracked to line 1176 and the indentation seems fine to me. Could it be something else?
[structures.txt](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/files/264824/structures.txt)

Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.42000

data.title: Add libmono-i18n4.0-all to the list of Debian package dependencies

milestone.title: release-20161015
milestone.description: Stability release with burning trees and video installation.

data.body: Fixes #11256 for real, hopefully.

data.title: Auto-unready when game-options change
data.body:
once players did ready-up on a server ... then every change in the options afterwards should auto-unready all participants , so they have a chance to react on a change (by ready-up again ,leaving the server or discussing the changes)

we should have this to prevent last-second-admin(troll)-changes

data.title: Trying to create a unique version of a unit (Flamethrower):
data.body:
So I am trying to create a flamethrower unit much in the way of the British Spy; I tried to modify its HP first, then lower its cost, etc. I had done this before (I think it was a Spring 2015 release of OpenRA?) without too many problems, but I repeatedly encounter an error (see Exception log): 
I basically copied the British Spy Example to create this unit: 
Original Unit:
E4:
    Inherits: ^Soldier
    Buildable:
        Queue: Infantry
        BuildAtProductionType: Soldier
        BuildPaletteOrder: 70
        Prerequisites: ~!infantry.china, ~barr, ftur, ~techlevel.low
    Valued:
        Cost: 300
    Tooltip:
        Name: Flamethrower
        Description: Advanced anti-structure unit.\n  Strong vs Infantry, Buildings\n  Weak vs Vehicles, Aircraft
    Health:
        HP: 40
    Armament@PRIMARY:
        Weapon: Flamer
        LocalOffset: 427,0,341
        FireDelay: 8
    Armament@GARRISONED:
        Name: garrisoned
        Weapon: Flamer
    AttackFrontal:
    WithInfantryBody:
        AttackSequence: shoot
    ProducibleWithLevel:
        Prerequisites: barracks.upgraded

Country's Unit:
E4.China:
    Inherits: E4
    Buildable:
        Prerequisites: ~infantry.china, ~barr, ftur, ~techlevel.low
    Valued:
        Cost: 300
    ToolTip:
        Name: Chinese Flamethrower
                Description: Stronger than typical flamethrowers. .\n  Strong vs Infantry, Buildings\n  Weak vs Vehicles, Aircraft
        Health:
        HP: 60
    RenderSprites:
        Image: e4

Exception log:
Red Alert- World at War Mod at Version V1
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.2.9200.0)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.42000
Exception of type `System.AggregateException`: One or more errors occurred.
Inner Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Cannot locate type: ToolTipInfo
     at OpenRA.ObjectCreator.<MissingTypeAction>m__7(String s)
   at OpenRA.ObjectCreator.CreateObject[T](String className, Dictionary`2 args)
   at OpenRA.ObjectCreator.CreateObject[T](String className)
   at OpenRA.ActorInfo.LoadTraitInfo(ObjectCreator creator, String traitName, MiniYaml my)
   at OpenRA.ActorInfo..ctor(ObjectCreator creator, String name, MiniYaml node)
   at OpenRA.Ruleset.<LoadDefaults>c__AnonStorey0.<>m__1(MiniYamlNode k)
   at OpenRA.Exts.ToDictionaryWithConflictLog[TSource,TKey,TElement](IEnumerable`1 source, Func`2 keySelector, Func`2 elementSelector, String debugName, Func`2 logKey, Func`2 logValue)
   at OpenRA.Ruleset.MergeOrDefault[T](String name, IReadOnlyFileSystem fileSystem, IEnumerable`1 files, MiniYaml additional, IReadOnlyDictionary`2 defaults, Func`2 makeObject)
   at OpenRA.Ruleset.<LoadDefaults>c__AnonStorey0.<>m__0()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.InnerInvoke()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Execute()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ThrowIfExceptional(Boolean includeTaskCanceledExceptions)
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait(Int32 millisecondsTimeout, CancellationToken cancellationToken)
   at OpenRA.Ruleset.LoadDefaults(ModData modData)
   at OpenRA.ModData.<ModData>m__2()
   at System.Lazy`1.CreateValue()
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
   at System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.ExceptionDispatchInfo.Throw()
   at System.Lazy`1.get_Value()
   at OpenRA.ModData.get_DefaultRules()
   at OpenRA.Ruleset.LoadDefaultsForTileSet(ModData modData, String tileSet)
   at OpenRA.Map.PostInit()
   at OpenRA.Map..ctor(ModData modData, IReadOnlyPackage package)
   at OpenRA.ModData.PrepareMap(String uid)
   at OpenRA.Game.StartGame(String mapUID, WorldType type)
   at OpenRA.Game.LoadShellMap()

data.title: Cold front fix
data.body:
http://resource.openra.net/maps/14034/

Fixed erroneous sporadic ore cell placement and a tiling error. Once the main ore patch at north spawn has been mined, the two largest red circled areas will each idle ore trucks if left unnoticed. Removed some other erroneous ore placement.

Also renamed the map from `cold-front-1v1` to `dual-cold-front` to match the in-game name for consistency.

![cf](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/3636652/15267188/aafe3658-19b2-11e6-9562-ba751e7d6f26.jpg)

data.title: Fix nod07b Lua script paths
data.body: Fixes the solution paths for Lua scripts added in #11235, also corrects the "one or more projects in the solution were not loaded correctly" error when opening the solution in VS.
